show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

header.title: Censored 2012:  Sourcebook for the Media Revolution — Overview and Introduction to

title: Censored 2012:  Sourcebook for the Media Revolution — Overview and Introduction to
content:
Censored 2012:  Sourcebook for the Media Revolution — Overview and Introduction to Project Censored and our latest... <!--more--> book, Censored 2012 Co- Hosts Prof.
Mickey Huff and Dr Peter Phillips, with Abby Martin of MediaRoots.
org Guests: Prof.
Adam Bessie, Diablo Valley College, contributor to Censored 2012 on News Abuse and Framing, Dr Andy Roth, former associate director of Project Censored contributor to Censored 2012, on Power, Abuse, and Accountability, and Mary Lia, coordinator of the Fair Share of the Common Heritage, works with Project Censored and the Media Freedom Foundation, on the Commons and our fair share of resources
